meanings.sent1: The seedman at the store helped me choose the best seeds for my garden.
meanings.sent2: The seedman had a wide variety of seeds available for purchase.
meanings.sent3: The seedman joked that he could 'grow money trees' with his seeds.
meanings.sent4: The seedman's knowledge of seeds was as vast as the fields he tended.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the friendly smile of the seedman as he handed me my seeds.

meanings.definition: A man who specializes in selling seeds.
meanings.sent1: My neighbor, the seedman, always has the freshest seeds in town.
meanings.sent2: The seedman's shop is known for its high-quality seeds and expert advice.
meanings.sent3: The seedman proudly proclaimed himself the 'seed king' of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: In the world of gardening, the seedman was a true seed whisperer.
meanings.sent5: Every gardener in town knew to seek out the seedman for the best seeds around.
